widget.name: Data Grid Extension (without context)
widget.description: Extends to Grid with some great options like: store changed column width, hide column and reordering columns. Should be placed inside a row right underneath a grid.

property.caption: Flex Header
property.description: When true, columns can Moved, store sort order and hidden. Can not be used in combination with responsive Columns.

property.caption: Responsive Columns
property.description: When true, the bootstrap responsive classes can be uses to show hide columns. Can not be used in combination with the hide an move headers

property.caption: Hide Unused Paging
property.description: Hide Paging Buttons when there is only one page

property.caption: No Page First Last
property.description: The minimum amount of pages the are needed to show first last buttons.

property.caption: Hide Unusable Buttons
property.description: Buttons that depent on selections do no need to be shown when no selection is made. (like edit, delete, Mf with params etc.)

property.caption: Render as
property.description: Show as a plain text, button or link.

property.caption: On click Microflow
property.description: The microflow to execute on click of button or link.

property.caption: Caption
property.description: The text to display if the grid is empty.

property.caption: Image
property.description: Optional, Image that is shown in front of the label of the button or link

property.caption: Hide Empty Table Header
property.description: Hide the table headers when empty

property.caption: Grid Entity
property.description: The entity of the same type as the data grid rows

property.caption: Row Class Attribute
property.description: The attribute to show as the name.

property.caption: Class Mapping
property.description: When no mapping is made the direct values will be made class names(removing special characters)

property.caption: Key
property.description: Key of enumeration, boolean (true, false) or string

property.caption: CSS Class
property.description: Class to be added at the row if the key matching
